verbose_text: Binding of EPO to its receptor leads to phosphorylation of both EPO-R and the signaling protein Janus kinase 2 (JAK2), which provides a docking complex for intracellular signaling proteins including phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K) and Akt, STAT5, and the extracellular signal regulated kinase ERK.
evidence: phosphorylation of both EPO-R and the signaling protein Janus kinase 2
